name: ODLOT
description:
by Holy Pangolin

Audio source material taken from Polish Radio Experimental Studio (PRES) compositions of Elżbieta Sikora, Krzysztof Knittel and Ryszard Szeremeta, as published by Instytut Adama Mickiewicza.

Actors taken from Pakamera Społeczna.

Environments taken from the surroundings of ICHOT Brama Poznania and the Cybina river.
